publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7991 Patricia Ferguson: Missing People’s Missing Rights Campaign—That the Parliament welcomes the Missing People’s Missing Rights campaign, which offers a lifeline to those who run away and go missing each year and provides support for those left behind; notes that the campaign’s aims seek to improve how families of missing people are supported following a disappearance; further notes that the Missing People charity provides its services in Scotland with the support of the People’s Postcode Lottery; considers this to be an important issue, and commends the two organisations for working together to tackle it.
S3M-7991 Missing People’s Missing Rights Campaign (lodged on 22 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Kenneth Gibson*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Trish Godman*, Marlyn Glen*, Mary Mulligan*, Mr Frank McAveety*
